import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {createStructuredSelectors} from 'reselect' import './checkout.styles.scss' import { selectCartItems, selectCartTotal } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selector' const checkOut = ({cartItems,total}) => (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price

{ cartItems.map(cartItem =>cartItem) }
) export const mapStateToProps=createStructuredSelectors({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartTotal } ) export default connect(null,mapStateToProps)(checkOut)
